div.style: border: 3px solid black; border-radius: 20px; padding: 20px; display: flex; justify-content: center; width: 800px;

a.style: width: 100px; height: 100px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;
width: 100px; height: 100px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;
width: auto; height: auto; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;
